name: **Inishgowla South**
description: Inishgowla South L927-858 Sheet 31 The impossibly pretty whitewashed cottage midway on NE side is actually a very modern comfortable self catering cottage for letting. The island is farmed with cattle as well as sheep, which means fences, and therefore unattractive to wild camping. Shallow water on inside is always passable but needs care in navigation.
